title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 11th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Fox News Contributor and former White House Press Secretary Ari Fleischer about his memories of 9/11.



Email Embed

+ Embed Code



Embed the following code on your website:



Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with incoming House Freedom Caucus Chairman Rep. Andy Biggs (R-AZ) about his caucus' plans for the new session of Congress.

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Fox and Friends Weekend Host Pete Hegseth about John Bolton's departure from the White House and President Trump's remarks about the Taliban.

Todd speaks with White House Deputy Press Secretary Hogan Gidley about John Bolton's departure from the White House and President Trump's comments about the Taliban.
